org.jcvi.jillion.sam.transform

Class SamTransformationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.sam.transform.SamTransformationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssemblyTransformationService

    public final class SamTransformationService
extends Object
implements AssemblyTransformationService
    SamTransformationService is a class that can parse a SAM file and call the appropriate methods on a given AssemblyTransformer so the transformer can get assembly and alignment information from the SAM file without knowing anything about how SAM files are formatted.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SamTransformationService(File samFile, File referenceFasta)
      Create a new SamTransformationService using the given SAM encoded file and a fasta file of the ungapped references sequences referred to in the SAM.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • SamTransformationService

        public SamTransformationService(File samFile,
                                File referenceFasta)
                         throws IOException
        Create a new SamTransformationService using the given SAM encoded file and a fasta file of the ungapped references sequences referred to in the SAM. The ids in the fasta file must match the reference sequence names in the SAM file (@SQ SN:$ID) in the SAM header.
        Parameters:
        samFile - the SAM file to parse and transform; can not be null and must exist.
        referenceFasta - the reference fasta file; can not be null and must exist.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the input files.
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public void transform(AssemblyTransformer transformer)
        Parse the SAM file and call the appropriate methods on the given AssemblyTransformer.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface AssemblyTransformationService
        Parameters:
        transformer - the AssemblyTransformer instance to call the methods on; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if transformer is null.
